content: lightweight and delicate short sleeve pattern with a sporty feel one piece top down construction designed to fit loosely for an easy to wear layering top yarn hedgehog fibres oh so fine cashmere 1 30% cashmere 70% merino 600m/100g 1 skein of the recommended yarn is required for sizes xs and s 2 skeins are required for all other sizes m-5xl the yardage calculations are approximate final amounts in g 82 94 104 120 133 145 159 171 180 lin is 5 2 and she s wearing size s the second version is pictured in my own handspun using a lucky dip fibre 2 pack by hedgehog fibres i spun a light fingering 2ply i m 5 4 and i m wearing size m 1 https //shop hedgehogfibres com/collections/oh-so-fine-cashmere 2 https //shop hedgehogfibres com/collections/fibre
